name: Tankodrome
description:
Tank warfare game. Player must defend HQ against multiple waves of NPCs.
Created in one 1 day.

Game is not adjusted for ITCH.IO GAME RESOLUTION!

Demonstration of more programming functionalities, e.g.:

  • AI of enemies (searching, chasing, shooting)
  • movement of a player
  • core loops and base game logic
  • sounds & effects
  • cooperation of inputs (rotating mouse - aim with turret, ...)
  • etc

Models downloaded from: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/tanks-tutoria...
